messages.message: Reminder to self to fix the auto ECR login script, which is currently broken

Hey, this is happening for my sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/prakhar?cw=dev) as well. It is happening for almost all services. It is a issue for other sandboxes as well I think. I've tried restarting, resyncing (all options). Can someone help please?

Maybe try to rerun the ECR login?


https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1752840924070989?thread_ts=1752766779.204549&cid=C05L87V014J

Forgot to mention, tried that as well. Failed with:
```An error occurred (AccessDeniedException) when calling the GetAuthorizationToken operation: User: arn:aws:iam::549230430157:user/ib-sandbox is not authorized to perform: ecr:GetAuthorizationToken on resource: * because no identity-based policy allows the ecr:GetAuthorizationToken action
Error: Cannot perform an interactive login from a non TTY device```
```[Gateway] rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = connection error: desc = "transport: failed to write client preface: use of closed network connection"```

I'm still running into this issue, I'm seeing

```An error occurred (UnrecognizedClientException) when calling the GetAuthorizationToken operation: The security token included in the request is invalid.
Error: Cannot perform an interactive login from a non TTY device```
when running the ECR login script. I assume the underlying AWS issue is still unresolved?
Are people aware of any workarounds to get services running in crafting? Or are we completely blocked from testing on crafting until the AWS issue is resolved?
